instructions: DO NOT USE CAMPAIGN COMMUNICATION STUDY PRE (NO.1)
introduction: Hello, I'm calling for marketing research.

question_1.text: Have you smoked any cigarettes in the past seven days?
question_1.follow_up: ASK IF THERE IS ANYONE IN THE HOME 18 OR OVER WHO SMOKES AND REPEAT. IF NO SMOKER, TERMINATE.

question_1b.text: About how many cigarettes do you usually smoke per day?
question_1b.note: DAY TERMINATE AND DO NOT RECORD OR INCLUDE IN QUOTA.

question_2.text: What brands have you seen advertised in the past two weeks?
